dataSpace.name: user
dataSpace.sql: select * from usr where email = '@{email}' or name = '@{username}' and usr.active = 'T'

select usr.id, usr.name, usr.type, usr.caption, usr.phone, usr.rolecode, usr.title, usr.password, org.code as orgcode, org.name as orgname, org.name as orgenname, org.id as orgid, '' as emp_id, usr.caption as emp_name, '' as emp_enname, '' as emp_title, '' as emp_entitle, '' as emp_department, '' as emp_endepartment, '' as emp_position from usr left join usrorg on usr.id = usrorg.userid left join org on usrorg.orgid = org.id where usr.active = 'T' and @{userfilter} @{orgfilter}

dataSpace.name: menu
dataSpace.sql: select * from menu where menu.id in (select menuid from roleauthority where rolecode = '@{rolecode}') and parentId is null order by orderno
select * from menu where menu.id in (select menuid from roleauthority where rolecode = '@{rolecode}') and rootId = '@{rootid}' order by grade, parentId, orderno

dataSpace.name: treeitory
dataSpace.sql: select parentid from employee where id = '@{id}'
select grandpaid from employee where id = '@{id}'
